title: Are Breakfast Foods Processed In and Out of Food Deserts?
description: A visualization delving into the intersection of breakfast and food inequity: Assuming universal product availability, food deserts and non-food deserts serve up similar distributions of highly-processed breakfast foods.

title: Economic Analysis of Power Outages
description: A comprehensive analysis to provide an economic perspective in which to examine disparities within the utility industry revolving around this central question: How can econonomic factors explain the length and cause of power outages?

title: Economics Research Lab Visualization
description: A visualization created for the Economics Research Lab, performing Complier Analysis on participants in a laboratory study.

title: Analyzing Vehicle Collisions in San Diego Neighborhoods
description: A visualization created for the Monarch School's DataJam Final Project, tracking whether the population density of a San Diego neighborhood affected the vehicle collisions it faced over a 10 year span.

title: The Generative Fossil Solution
description: A DCGAN model that synthesizes immages of fossils, specifically ammonites, to fill the worldwide scracity in fossil images.

title: Synthesis 1 Portfolio
description: A portfolio combining two propoganda posters, a sonic piece, and an impassioned statement to represent the different forms of climate communication.

title: Does Green Investment Have an Effect On Reducing Greenhouse Gas Emissions?
description: A set of visualizations that incorporate both perceptive and deceptive techniques, tasked at arguing for both sides of this proposotion: Environmental investment has a significant effect on reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

title: The Statistical Power of Bayesian Thinking: From Foundations to Data Science Applications
description: A technical article focused on the history, derivation, technicalities, and applications of Bayesian principles in data science, specifically for Bayesian Active Deep Learning.

title: Synthesis 2 Proposal: Temporal Time Shifting
description: A proposal to implement Temporal Time Shifting in La Jolla Neighborhoods, complete with Literature Review, Aims and Objectives, Research Design and Methodology, Ethical Considerations, and Budget.

title: Identifying Vulnerabilities in Blockchain Technology
description: Linked the OWASP Top 10 security risks for web applications to blockchain vulnerabilities, and simulated penetration testing for smart contracts.

title: World Happiness Analysis
description: A comprehensive analysis on world happiness, including exploratory data analysis, regression, and classification models to find the most important variables in predicting whether countries were happy.

title: Clenergy
description: Established a website that tracked clean energy usage and returned energy statistics for specific countries.
